author.bio: ESC helps content creators achieve their dreams.
author.name: ESC

node.title: React Testing
node.excerpt: React Testing is a set of helpers that let you test React components without relying on their implementation details. This approach makes refactoring a breeze and also nudges you towards best practices for accessibility.

author.bio: ESC helps content creators achieve their dreams.
author.name: ESC

node.title: Next.js is the future
node.excerpt: Next.js is an open-source development framework built on top of Node.js enabling React based web applications functionalities such as server-side rendering and generating static websites.

node.title: Building an Inclusive Web: Why Accessibility Matters
node.excerpt: In this article I’ll share my point of view about why accessibility is important; from empathy and what is simply “good business”, through to selfishness.

author.bio: I'm Tania, a designer, developer, writer, and former chef. I love creating open source projects and contributing to the developer community. I write the missing instruction manuals of the web.
author.name: Tania Rascia

node.title: Code Your First API With Node.js and Express
node.excerpt: If you've spent any amount of time with modern web development, you will have come across terms like REST and API. If you've have heard of these terms or work with APIs but don't have a complete understanding of how they work or how to build your own API, this series is for you.
